<title level="1" right="Rules">[Basic Magic Weapon](/Rules.aspx?ID=3178)</title>

**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 240 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">
<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">
Many magic weapons are created by [etching runes onto them](/Rules.aspx?ID=3165). The [magic weapon](/Equipment.aspx?ID=2861) stat block covers the Prices and attributes of the most common weapons you can make with only fundamental runes.
</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>
